about_the_game:
IVOR is a throwback first-person shooter inspired by the classics of the late 90's and early 00's. You play as the titular character, Ivor, a skilled warrior who was been sealed in the Tree of Life for centuries. When he is suddenly awakened and released from the Tree, he takes up arms and fights against hordes of undead who now roam the world he once knew. You'll traverse seven different regions of the world in search of answers and glory.



FEATURES
  • Over 20 levels spanning 7 expansive, Norse-inspired environments. Explore hidden temples, deep snowy valleys, and even the cosmos beyond!
  • 8 brutal weapons to with which to slay your foes. Take up traditional arms like a break-action shotgun, as well as magical tools of destruction like a nether-infused energy rifle.
  • Relentless, intelligent, and nimble monsters to challenge your skills. Outsmart them, outmaneuver them, then crush them into squelching giblets.
  • Absolutely ANNIHILATE your foes by chaining melee attacks after entering Berserk Mode.
  • Deep customization with gameplay modifiers, including accessibility options and challenge modes. Turn up the heat with the Elder Rune system and cause some havoc!

short_description: A blood-pumping throwback FPS set in a Norse-inspired world. The undead have risen and Ivor, the Drengr, has awakened. Take up your axes, load your shotgun, and get to killing.
